notes: [Improved] Removed `::class` syntax, which makes QQ compatible with PHP 5.4!
[Added] Added sweet new plugin icons by Sean O'Grady (@miralize).
[Improved] Tweaked plugin name/description to be a bit prettier in the Plugins list.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Twig's ignore_strict_check wouldn't be recursively set.
[Added] Added actual documentation in the readme.
[Improved] Swapped in more robust PHP version comparisons.
[Improved] Unified the native and shim logic into a single operator class.
[Improved] Cleaned up some comments and some plugin file methods.
